job.description: Controle expiration date of SSL certificates. Send alert if the certificate expire in X day, parameterized in script.
job.executionEnabled: {% if job.uuid in jobs_disable_execution %}false{% else %}true{% endif %}
job.name: Check ssl certificate expiration date

command.script:
#!/bin/sh
HOSTNAME="localhost" PORT="443" ALERT_X_DAY_BEFORE=10
# Get current date as timestamp CURR_DATE=$(date +%s)
# Get enddate from certificate of hostname:port identified CERT_DATE_AS_STRING=$(echo | openssl s_client -connect ${HOSTNAME}:${PORT} 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -enddate -noout | cut -d '=' -f 2)
CERT_EXP_DATE=$(date --date="${CERT_DATE_AS_STRING}" +%s)
DAYS_REMAINING=$(( ( $CERT_EXP_DATE - $CURR_DATE ) / 86400 ))
if [ $DAYS_REMAINING -lt 0 ]; then echo "Certificat expirÃ© sur $(hostname -f)" exit 1; fi
if [ $DAYS_REMAINING -lt $ALERT_X_DAY_BEFORE ]; then echo "$DAYS_REMAINING jours avant expiration sur $(hostname -f)" exit 1; fi
